drills.name: Cone Dribbling
drills.description: Set up cones in a straight line and practice dribbling through them using both feet.

drills.name: Passing Squares
drills.description: Form squares with 4 players passing to each other, focusing on accurate passes and first touch.

drills.name: Shooting Practice
drills.description: Take shots from different angles and distances, alternating between power and placement.

drills.name: Possession Game
drills.description: 5v2 keep-away in a small area to improve quick passing and movement.

drills.name: Advanced Juggling
drills.description: Practice juggling with different body parts and challenge yourself with tricks.

drills.name: 1v1 Attacking
drills.description: Practice beating a defender in 1v1 situations using various moves and feints.
